name: Mc Solid Croqueto
description:
Well this is quite the day. You just woke from your comfy plate to find it empty, and all your sisters are gone. And worse yet: the family pugs broke loose from their room! The kitchen is pure chaos, and you can hear your sisters asking for help from around all corners.

Run as fast as you can through all this chaos and save the croquetas from their impending doom. But be careful! The pugs are out there to get you all, you'll have to be as sneaky as possible!

(Game still in beta because Unity decided to censor our awesome croquetas <3 )
